"That really hurt my feelings, that tip," Rasheed Wallace said. You can't let that frustrate you. I missed two point-blank foul shots. I'm upset at myself about that. You can't let that one thing get you down. That's what we did, just dug deep and came up with some stops down the stretch. Richard Leonard Hamilton scored 24 points and Allen Iverson added 23 as the Pistons won for the second straight time to open their four-game road trip after losing their first two games with Allen Iverson . Google co-founder Sergey Brin , who will also focus on strategic projects and new products. " Eric Schmidt has clearly done an outstanding job leading Google for the last decade," Page said in a written statement. The results speak for themselves. There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly. Eric Schmidt is a tremendous leader and I have learned innumerable lessons from him. His advice and efforts will be invaluable to me as I start in this new role. Google still has such incredible opportunity-- we are only at the beginning and I can't wait to get started. The changes takes effect April 4. Google Thursday reported fourth-quarter revenues of$ 8.44 billion, an increase of 26 percent compared to the fourth quarter of 2009-- topping analysts expectations.

What Yahoo is to Bing, Nokia is to Windows Phone 7. "The game has changed from a war of devices to a war of ecosystems," said Nokia CEO Stephen Elop at his press conference. We have an opportunity to disrupt the trajectory in the mobile ecosystem. Together we will deliver great mobile products. Google has just announced in conjunction with its 29% rise in fourth-quarter profit, that co-founder Larry Page will assume the role of chief executive officer( CEO) from early April onwards, while co-founder Sergey Brin will devote his energy to strategic projects. As for current CEO Eric Schmidt , he will end up as the executive chairman. gevangenis, meent Donald Rumsfeld dat er toch "koppen hadden moeten rollen". Probleem was echter dat veel van de bevelhebbers in het veld nog maar net aangesteld waren en dus weinig hadden kunnen doen aan de situatie. Dat betekende dat er niemand overbleef behalve ik. Tot twee keer toe schreef Donald Rumsfeld een ontslagbrief aan President Bush , die hij persoonlijk op het Witte Huis kwam bezorgen.
